programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: The Monstering: When human girl Clawdeen isn't allowed into Monster High because she's human, she devises other ways to get into the school. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Draculaura practices witchcraft illegally in 'Food Fight', then in 'Unfinished Brain-ness', Frankie, cursed from their brain's past life, gets help from Frankie, Clawdeen, and Draculaura. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Are You Afraid of the Park?: Max and Phoebe start a fight between Billy and Nora so they can avoid riding a roller coaster, but it all backfires when things get out of control. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Evil Never Sleeps: Phoebe's allegiance is torn when she learns her boyfriend's father might be plotting a return to evil, and she must decide whether to take him down. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Mouth Candy: Jasper's enthusiasm leads him to send Captain Man and Kid Danger into incidents that aren't crimes. When he's falsely accused and sent to jail, Henry and Ray must get him free. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Gas Or Fail: When Captain Man finds himself trapped underground, Henry must devise a way to sneak out of his school's standardized testing to save Ray. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: The Museum: The kids find evidence that could prove Erik's innocence. But someone erases the footage! Max realises there is something strange about how his birth parents tracked him down. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Vanity gives one of the Smurfs a makeover in 'Papa Times Two', then in 'Fake News', Jokey tricks Poet into writing a sensational (but very fake) news story in the Daily Smurf. (S1, ep 24)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Gargamel Goes Gaga: After accidentally consuming a love potion, Gargamel falls in love with Leaf and doesn't want to leave her side. (S2, ep 14b)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester decide to trick feuding magicians in 'Get Shirty', then in 'This Solves Nothing', Diamondo is holding a mystery dinner party, but Best and Bester solve a mystery for real! (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob wants to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean in 'High Sea Diving', then in 'Bottle Burglars', SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way in 'My Leg!', then in 'Ink Lemonade', Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well, so Squidward offers help.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Saving Simon: Believing Simon is going away to a boarding school, Alvin and Theodore do all they can to thwart his departure and keep him at home. (S1, ep 30)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Sub: Alvin reluctantly signs up to teach the after school music class, but finds his classmates treat him differently as a teacher. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Held Back: Miss Smith tells Alvin that if he doesn't pass a test, he'll be held back a year and separated from his brothers. Rather than study harder, Alvin plots to make Simon and Theodore fail too!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Knights: After learning about The Knights of the Round Table, Theodore hopes to be a knight and comically struggles to do 'good deeds'.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward's amazing new life is threatened in 'Squidness Protection', and in 'Dome Alone', stuck in her dome, Sandy suspects Plankton's up to no good and recruits Patrick to investigate. (S15, ep 6)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lisa builds a real nuclear reactor in 'Lights, Camera, Nuclear Reaction!', then in 'Food Courting', Leni realizes Miguel has a crush on Gavin, so she sets out to help Miguel woo him. (S6, ep 14)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick hires other Patricks to entertain at parties in 'Too Many Patricks', then in 'Much Tofu About Nothing', Pat-Thos shares a Hamdonian tale of love and pork products. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Kiss Me, Nate: Max is nervous when his girlfriend auditions for the romantic lead opposite a cute boy in the school play, and he convinces Phoebe to audition for the same role. (S3, ep 16)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Love Muffin: When Captain Man suddenly announces he's getting married, Henry and Charlotte go searching for answers only to discover that things are not as they seem. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: The Boo Crew ignores Lagoona's creative vision in 'Monster Movie', then in 'Earworm', seeking popularity, Toralei and her bandmates release mind-controlling earworms to gain adoring fans. (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Spell The Beans: When Dracula investigates a witch rumour at Monster High, Draculaura debates sharing her secret. Meanwhile, Frankie and Deuce look for the Gorgon Talisman. (S1, ep 14)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob finds a cute but inconvenient companion in 'Lighthouse Louie', then in 'Hiccup Plague', no one in Bikini Bottom is safe from a case of contagious hiccups.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: There is a certain amount of confusion, right away, in 'You Don't Know Sponge', and in 'Tunnel of Glove', SpongeBob and Pearl get stuck in the Tunnel of Glove, a romantic river ride at Glove World.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Tour: The Chipmunks can't wait to go on a World tour until Theodore and Alvin realize what they'll be leaving behind. (S5, ep 25a)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Mister Manners: Alvin must pass a manners course before he gets his dream meeting with the beautiful Princess of England! Problem is, he has to convince Brittany he's worthy. (S1, ep 28)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dragon Dad: Theodore orders a dragon egg in the hopes of it hatching into a real dragon. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Special Delivery: When Simon and Alvin realize that Theodore's been mistakenly mailed off in a box, they have to do whatever it takes to get him home before dinner.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Patrick Show gets competing sponsors in 'The Patrick Show Sells Out', then in 'Neptune's Ball', the Star family visits King Neptune's palace. (S1, ep 21)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob misplaces his lucky tie clip in 'Bad Luck Bob', then in 'The Sandman Cometh', Patrick suddenly can't fall asleep. (S15, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Never Friending Story: Phoebe and Max worry that they will be stuck hanging out together all the time when their friends start to spend time with each other. (S2, ep 11)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Fate of Danger - Part 2: Kid Danger and Captain Man battle to stop Drex erasing Swellview's memory of Captain Man. One hero must stay behind to save the day. (S5, ep 40)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick try to join the extreme sports team The Drasticals in 'Extreme Spots', and then in 'Squirrel Record', Sandy finds a book of world records and tries to break them all!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob thinks he's allergic to his pineapple, so Squidward offers to help find him a new home in 'Unreal Estate', then in 'Code Yellow', Squidward is getting a nose job at the local hospital.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick hosts a time-travelling food show in 'Time to Eat', then in 'Cleaning House', while Bunny's in Klopnod, the Star home becomes a mess. (S2, ep 13)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln seeks a better seat in class in 'Musical Chairs', then in 'The Taunting Hour', Lynn gets heckled at her soccer game, and the Louds realize they all have critics. (S6, ep 5)

programme.title: Zokie of Planet Ruby
programme.desc: Ruby and Zokie take advantage of Earl's lucid dreaming in 'Los Muchos Amores de Earl', then in 'Tweenkle Rebrands', nkle turns 16 and decides to change her image. (S1, ep 20)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob misplaces his lucky tie clip in 'Bad Luck Bob', then in 'The Sandman Cometh', Patrick suddenly can't fall asleep. (S15, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Secret Revealed, Part 2: With the Villain League determined to halt Phoebe's superhero ascension and destroy the Thundermans, Max must finally choose between good and evil. (S3, ep 14)

programme.title: The Really Loud House
programme.desc: Last Friend Standing: Lynn's competitive nature has always meant that she struggles in non-competitive settings, like sleepovers. So the family decides to help Lynn to host one. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: Splitting Adam

programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae Kris yn edrych ar obsesiwn Hollywood gyda marwolaeth; eirch drud; a chompostio. This time, Kris looks at Hollywood's obsession with death; expensive caskets; and composting.

programme.desc: Yn y bennod yma ma'r gwaith trydanol yn cael ei orffen cyn tanio'r engine am y tro cynta! The mini has it's electrics finished off before the engine is started for the 1st time!

programme.title: New: Mini Hana Medi
programme.desc: Ma'r diwrnod mawr wedi cyrraeddd a'r Mini a Hana wedi dod i drac Pembre i weld sut ma'r car yn rhedeg. The mini and Hana have both arrived at the track in Pembrey for the ultimate test.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chân i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno â dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Sam Tân a'i ffrindiau yn y pentre'. The adventures of Sam Tân and friends in the village.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddynt chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc. Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Pan mae ei grys-T newydd yn cosi mae'n gwrthod gwisgo unrhyw ddillad! Pablo finds an itchy label in his T-shirt and decides not to get dressed!

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Cyfres animeiddiedig i blant yn dilyn anturiaethau Tib, Lalw a Bobl. An animated series for children following the adventures of Tib, Lalw and Bobl.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Llwyd yn ffeindio hen ddarlun brwnt o gôr eu cyndeidiau ac mae Gwich yn cynnig dechrau côr newydd. Badger finds a painting of the Riverbankers' ancestors choir - inspiration perhaps?

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae Cadi, y gyrrwr trên, mewn trafferth pan fydd dwy ddraig ifanc yn mynd â'i hinjan stêm am daith heb ofyn. Trouble for Cadi when young dragons take her steam engine for an unplanned trip.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Blero yn ymuno â Sim a'i ffrindiau i fynd ar antur y tu mewn i frechdan i dynnu lluniau o atomau i Faer Oci. Blero joins Sim and friends on a mission inside a sandwich to take photos.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae Deian a Loli wedi diflasu mynd o gwmpas Oriel, ac felly'n rhewi eu rhieni ac yn mynd i chwilio am gaffi. Deian and Loli freeze their parents and go looking for a cafe and some havoc!

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: Dyffryn Mwmin
programme.desc: Mae Fi Fach yn mynd rhy bell wrth bryfoco Mwmintrol. Fi Fach goes too far in teasing Moomintrol. As a result he decides to write a letter which causes Mwmian to return and take Fi Fach away.

programme.title: Chwarter Call
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Cadi, Luke, Jed a Miriam yn y gyfres gomedi hon. Digonedd o hwyl a chwerthin gyda Seren Sassy, Mic Moc a'r Anhygoels. Plenty of fun with Seren Sassy, Mic Moc and the Anhygoels.

programme.title: LEGO ® Ffrindiau: Amdani Ferched!
programme.desc: Mae'r merched yn ymarfer ar gyfer y ras, ond pan ymuna Dotie Rae a'i ffrind mynwesol gyda Y TIM, does dim stop arnyn nhw. The girls learn of Dottie Rae's long-lost love and bring him in.

programme.title: PwySutPam?
programme.desc: Cawn ddarganfod mwy am dai bach gyda'r gwyddonydd Bedwyr ab Ion Thomas. We discover more about toilets: since when have they existed, how do they work, & where does all the pee and poo go?!

programme.title: Rhyfeddodau Chwilengoch
programme.desc: Animeiddiad am ferch cyffredin sy'n byw bywyd cyffredin - ond mae hefyd ganddi bwerau siwper-arwres! An ordinary girl, living an ordinary life - but she also has super powers!

programme.title: CIC
programme.desc: Heddiw: Lloyd a Heledd yn mentro i'r llethr sgio, dysgu am y sled gyda dau o dîm Prydain, sialens cyrlio ar y rinc a Chlwb Sgio Pembre yw'r olaf i wynebu Sialens y Sgwad. Today: skiing.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Anni a Lili yn cael trafferth efo'r seinydd clyfar ac yn archebu pethau annisgwyl wrth geisio holi am gerddoraieth. Anni and LIli are having trouble with the smart speaker. [SL]

programme.title: Canu Gyda Fy Arwr
programme.desc: Pennod 1. Tristian, Sam a Catrin sy'n cael rhannu'r llwyfan a pherfformio gyda'u harwr Huw Chiswell. Three people perform with their musical idol. Special appearance by Band Pres Llareggub. [SL]

programme.title: Dim Byd i Wisgo
programme.desc: Eurof sydd yn y stiwdio steilio heddiw - cyn brifathro sy'n caru popeth rygbi ac sy'n byw mewn shorts a dillad chwaraeon! Today, Eurof - a former head teacher - gets the makeover treatment. [SL]

programme.title: Codi Pac
programme.desc: Geraint Hardy sydd yn 'Codi Pac' ac yn ymlwybro o gwmpas Cymru, a thref Llandudno sy'n serennu yr wythnos hon. Geraint Hardy journeys around Wales - this week, what Llandudno has to offer. [SL]

programme.title: Richard Holt: Yr Academi Felys 2022
programme.desc: Am y tro olaf, mae'r pobyddion yn cystadlu am y brif wobr gyda 'theganau' retro yn yr Ystafell De! The finalists serve retro cakes at Richard's Tea Room. Who will be this year's winner? [SL]

programme.title: Cais Quinnell
programme.desc: Yr wythnos hon, mae Scott yn rhoi cynnig ar arlunio byw, yn cartio ac yn cael gwers arwyddo Makaton. This week Scott tries out life drawing, karting and has a Makaton signing lesson. [SL]

programme.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer
programme.desc: Heno, sgwrs efo'r ymladdwr cawell o Bontarddulais, Brett Johns, fydd yn rhannu straeon o'r galon am ei fywyd a gyrfa heriol. Tonight Elin chats under the stars with cagefighter Brett Johns. [SL]

programme.title: Siwrna Scandi Chris
programme.desc: Mae Chris yn Sweden, lle mae'n profi clasuron y wlad cyn cyfarfod â'i arwr bwyd Niklas Ekstedt. Chris is in Sweden sampling classic Swedish dishes and meeting his food hero Niklas Ekstedt. [SL]

programme.title: Am Dro!
programme.desc: Wendy, Efan, Glyn a Mari sy'n ein tywys ar hyd prom Aber; i Raeadr Fawr; drwy ddyffryn Gwy; ac o Harlech i Landanwg. Walks in Aberystwyth, Abergwyngregyn, Wye Valley and the Harlech coast. [SL]

programme.title: Ysbyty: Dan Bwysau
programme.desc: Awn i Adran Argyfwng Maelor Wrecsam; cawn olwg onest ar be sy'n achosi eu problemau a sut ma'r ysbyty am ddatrys pethau. We take an unflinching look at Wrexham Maelor's Emergency department. [SL]

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae 'na ymwelydd yng ngardd Adam yng Ngorslas, ac fe fydd digonedd o gyngor am blannu tatws! Over in Ruthin Sioned celebrates Easter with a Spring bouquet, and Meinir creates a bog garden. [SL]

programme.title: Llanymddyfri v Pont-y-pwl
programme.desc: Rownd chwarteri Super Rygbi Cymru gyda Llanymddyfri yn chwarae Pont-y-pwl. C/G 5.15. Super Rygbi Cymru Quarter Finals as Llandovery play Pontypool. K/O 5.15.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Cysgu o Gwmpas
programme.desc: Bwyty dwy seren Michelin Ynyshir yw'r cyrchfan i Beti a Huw y tro hwn. Today, Beti George and Huw Stephens visit Ynyshir Michelin two star restaurant, and visit the nearby bird reserve.

programme.title: Alun, Chris a Kiri yn Seland Newydd
programme.desc: Ym mhennod olaf y gyfres, mae'r tri'n ymweld â phyllau daearwresol sanctaidd y Maori yn Rotorua. Last episode and the trio enjoy a mud bath, and a surfing lesson in a storm!

programme.title: Llofruddiaeth y Bwa Croes
programme.desc: Ebrill 2019 - mae pensiynwr yn cael ei saethu gyda bwa croes ar Ynys Môn. A fydd Heddlu Gogledd Cymru yn medru darganfod pwy oedd yn gyfrifol? A focus on the Anglesey crossbow killing.

programme.title: Iolo: Natur Bregus Cymru

programme.title: The Nudist Story
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Director: Ramsey Herrington. Stars Shelley Martin, Brian Cobby, Natalie Lynn. A woman is horrified when she inherits a nudist camp but her views are challenged when she falls in love. [S]

programme.title: The Rough and the Smooth
programme.desc: 1959. Drama. Starring Nadja Tiller, Tony Britton and William Bendix. Directed by Robert Siodmak. An archaeologist forsakes his fiancée for a passionate affair with a beautiful German woman. [S]

programme.title: Shadows on the Stairs
programme.desc: 1941. Crime. Director: D. Ross Lederman. Stars Frieda Inescort & Paul Cavanagh. Occupants of a boarding house become suspects after a string of murders. [S]

programme.title: A Yank In Ermine
programme.desc: 1955. Comedy. An American air-man (Peter Thompson) inherits an English title but will he cope with English nobility? Starring Jon Pertwee and Sid James. [S]

programme.title: Lily of Killarney
programme.desc: 1934. Set in Ireland, a poor Landowner's rival frames him for a murder. Stars John Garrick & Stanley Holloway is well suited to his semi-comic role as a baritone Father O'Flynn. [S]

programme.title: Stars In Your Eyes
programme.desc: 1956. Musical. Directed by Maurice Elvey. Stars Nat Jackley, Pat Kirkwood & Bonar Colleano. A group of talented entertainers band together to purchase a run-down theatre to put on a show. [S]

programme.title: Stranger In Town
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Directed George Pollock. Starring Alex Nicol, Anne Paige & Mary Laura Wood. In a sleepy village, a composer is shot dead and a woman is found gassed. Who killed them and why? [S]

programme.title: The Green Cockatoo
programme.desc: 1937. Crime Drama. Directed by William Cameron Menzies. Stars John Mills, Rene Ray & Robert Newton. A Soho entertainer teams up with a young woman to find out who killed his brother. [S]

programme.title: Tread Softly Stranger
programme.desc: 1958. Crime Drama. Sizzling Calico (Diana Dors) plans a robbery to cover-up embezzlement and gambling debts of brothers John (George Baker) and Dave (Terence Morgan). [S]

programme.title: A Home of Your Own
programme.desc: 1965. Comedy. Directed by Jay Lewis Stars Ronnie Barker, Peter Butterworth & Bernard Cribbins. A wordless, satirical look at British builders as they attempt to build a young couple's dream home.

programme.title: The Writing on the Wall
programme.desc: Mike Read continues his journey across the country to find the Blue Plaques, and the stories behind them. This episode features John and Hayley Mills, Robin Gibb and Brinsworth House. [S]

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: 1944. Drama. Director: Sidney Gilliat. Stars Stewart Granger, John Mills, Alastair Sim & Joy Shelton. After Jim reports for military duty, he suspects that his bride has been seeing another man. [S]

programme.title: Calling All Cars
programme.desc: 1954. Starring Cardew Robinson, Adrienne Fancey, John Fitzgerald and Pauline Olsen. Comedy documentary, centring on the Dover Harbour car terminal. Directed by Maclean Rogers. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life The Ganges Might Lead Anywhere
programme.desc: 1968. An intriguing look at the many different kinds of religion found in India.

programme.title: The Thirty Nine Steps
programme.desc: 1978. Crime. Director: Don Sharp. Stars Robert Powell, Karen Dotrice, David Warner & John Mills. An engineer attempts to prevent Prussian agents from executing a political assassination. [S]

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: Etta Smith. 1995. Michael Aspel delves into another fascinating and extraordinary story - how Etta Smith succeeded where the Los Angeles Police Department failed with her psychic powers. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Doom and dread join Caroline in the Cellar Club tonight, but there is plenty to enjoy. First up, is Doomwatch - The Web of Fear, about a strange outbreak of yellow fever plaguing the Scilly Isles. [S]

programme.title: Doomwatch
programme.desc: The Web of Fear. 1971. Stars Simon Oates, Vivien Sherrard, Stephanie Bidmead. The Scilly Isles are quarantined following a mysterious outbreak of yellow fever. Doomwatch take on the investigation. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: A terrifying murder mystery is up next, as Caroline Munro presents the 1939 feature The Dark Eyes of London starring horror legend Bela Lugosi and also featuring Greta Gynt and Hugh Williams. [S]

programme.title: The Dark Eyes of London
programme.desc: 1939. Horror. Directed by Walter Summers. Stars Bela Lugosi & Hugh Williams. A series of drownings in the Thames starts Inspector Holt on the trail of one of London's most sinister murderers. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Join Caroline Munro for a sneak peek at next week's treats including another intriguing investigation and the rise of the living dead. [S]

programme.title: Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde
programme.desc: 1980. Horror. Director: Alastair Reid. Stars David Hemmings, Lisa Harrow & Diana Dors. Dr Henry Jekyll experiments on his own personality, resulting in a terrifying struggle between good and evil. [S]

programme.title: Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde
programme.desc: 1980. Horror. Director: Alastair Reid. Stars David Hemmings, Lisa Harrow & Diana Dors. Dr Henry Jekyll experiments on his own personality, resulting in a terrifying struggle between good and evil. [S]

programme.title: During One Night
programme.desc: 1961. Drama. Directed and written by Sidney J Furie. Starring Don Borisenko & Susan Hampshire. A sensitive story of two airmen. One with a terrible injury and one dealing with life. [S]

programme.title: The Girl On The Pier
programme.desc: 1953. Crime. Director: Lance Comfort. Stars Veronica Hurst, Ron Randell & Marjorie Rhodes. Rivalry between a Brighton crooner who has done time and his partner in crime, who is being blackmailed. [S]

programme.title: Tell Me Another
programme.desc: Showbusiness Colleagues. 1976. Personal anecdotes as told to Dick Hills. This episode stars Liza Goddard, Alfred Marks, Jack Parnell, Joan Turner & Kenneth Williams. [S]

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: The Reluctant Warriors. 1964. Narrated by Sir Michael Redgrave. It's 1939. A wonderful summer in Britain comes to an end. On September the third, a voice is heard on the radio. It is war. [S]

programme.title: Cotton Queen
programme.desc: 1937. Comedy. Director Bernard Vorhaus. Stars Will Fyffe, Stanley Holloway & Jimmy Hanley. Rival cotton mill owners work together to win a contract when love blossoms between the rival's siblings. [S]

programme.title: Murder at the Grange
programme.desc: 1952. Drama. Directed by Victor M. Gover. Starring Tod Slaughter & Patrick Barr. A private investigator is approached by two old ladies who say they are being terrorised. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed at the end of April and beginning of May. [S]

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: The Rings of Saturn. 1963. Stars Murray Kash, Libby Morris & Ronnie Stevens. While observing Saturn, the crew notice a meteor shadowing the Galasphere, but discover it is a Saturnian spacecraft. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Devil's Fingers. 1966. Stars Adam West, Liberace & Marilyn Hanold. Batman and Robin must stop a nefarious concert pianist who's plotting to kill Bruce and marry Aunt Harriet. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: The Alchemist of Rouen. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh, Julie Alexander & Trader Faulkner. Richard must investigate when Lady Rosalie informs him that her fiancé has been bewitched by an alchemist. [S]

programme.title: Supercar
programme.desc: False Alarm. 1961. Stars David Graham, George Murcell & Graydon Gould. The Supercar team receives a distress call instigated by Masterspy to rescue two geologists trapped in the mountains. [S]

programme.title: The Rescue Squad
programme.desc: 1963. Family. Directed by Colin Bell. Stars Christopher Brett, Shirley Joy & Peter Butterworth. A group of children attempt to retrieve their toy plane from the top of an abandoned tower. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Bagpiper. 1960. Stars Richard Greene & Hugh McDermott. A wild Highlander clansman returns to the outlaw camp, causing trouble for Robin's men, and he reveals plans to take down the Sheriff. [S]

programme.title: The Incredible Petrified World
programme.desc: 1959. Sci-fi. Directed by Jerry Warren. Stars John Carradine, Robert Clarke & Phyllis Coates. Four explorers find themselves trapped in underwater caves when the cable on their diving bell snaps. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Glamour Gets a Passport
programme.desc: 1964. A fabulous glimpse of the fashion industry, with a look at its export plans.

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: The Vision. 1959. Starring Bruce Gordon, Pernell Roberts & Peter Miles. During WW1, four French Soldiers are put on trial for deserting their posts and cowardice. [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Clive Exton. Dick's Aunt (Stella Kemball) tells him that her house has vanished. Richard Marley reveals that Harold Jenkins (Peter Godfrey) has perfected his ultimate weapon.

programme.title: Fireball XL-5
programme.desc: Drama at Space City. 1963. Stars David Graham, Sylvia Anderson & Paul Maxwell. While on holiday, Steve and Venus leave Zoonie with Commander Zero's son, but they soon start to cause chaos.

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Crater 101. 1968. Stars Sylvia Anderson, Gary Files & Cy Grant. Scarlet, Blue and Green go on a dangerous mission to remove the Mysteron complex's power source before an atomic device destroys it.

programme.title: Playtime
programme.desc: 1967. Comedy. Directed by and stars Jacques Tati. With Barbara Dennek & Rita Maiden. When Monsieur Hulot has to contact a US official in Paris, he gets lost in the complexity of the modern city. [S]

programme.title: A Gunman Has Escaped
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Stars John Harvey, John Fitzgerald, Robert Cartland. Written by John Gilling. Three armed robbers kill a passer-by in a robbery and flee the city. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Scot Free. 1976. Stars John Blackburn, Rupen Budhdeo, Douglas Fielding & Pat Gorman. Two boys are trapped in a disused mine, but why is their friend terrified of going to the police? [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: 1970. Brothers In War. Created by John Finch. Stars Colin Douglas & Shelagh Fraser. Philip and David clash over a woman. Robert's mother has trouble accepting that he has now grown up. [S]

programme.title: The Cassandra Crossing
programme.desc: 1976. Drama. Director: George P Cosmatos. Stars Sophia Loren, Richard Harris, Burt Lancaster & Martin Sheen. Passengers of a European train can't escape after a deadly virus is planted. [S]

programme.title: Cause Célèbre
programme.desc: 1987. Drama. Directed by John Gorrie. Stars Helen Mirren, Harry Andrews & David Suchet. The story of Alma Rattenbury and her young lover, who were jointly accused of murdering her elderly husband. [S]

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: Rigsby is dressed to kill as he takes Miss Jones out to dinner to celebrate her birthday. S1 E3: A Night Out

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: Rigsby is given some advice from Alan and Philip - as well as some tablets - to calm his nerves in his amorous pursuit of Miss Jones. S1 E4: Charisma

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: Mr Spooner annoys the household by playing his radio loudly - Rigsby is annoyed, but he finds it difficult to pluck up the courage to confront him about it. S1 E5: All Our Yesterdays

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: When Miss Jones sees a prowler through her window, Rigsby suspects everyone else as a police detective appears and begins to investigate. S1 E6: The Prowler

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: An election polarises the household - Rigsby supports the Conservatives, Alan and Philip lean towards Labour, and Miss Jones is impressed with the Liberal candidate. S1 E7: Stand Up and Be Counted

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: When Ruth is depressed following the 'deception' of a recent male friend, Rigsby takes what he believes to be his chance to woo her. S2 E1: The Permissive Society

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: Miss Jones is collecting for a famine charity when Philip challenges Rigsby to go 48 hours without eating - Rigsby gladly accepts the offer but soon finds his will weakening. S2 E2: Food Glorious Food

programme.title: Rising Damp
